RunOnlyIf.description: A JS function that evaluates to boolean describes whether this step will run or not. Previous steps VarNames is typically used to author the function.

VarName.description: Applicable only if the step is Prompt/*. And hence the VarName resembles the name of the variable will carry the user input.

DiplayText.description: The user friendly text to be displayed describing the objective of the step

Options.description: Only in the case that only there is a specific set of values, the user should select from.

Composer.description: A java script function composes the output of the step

IsActive.description: Dictates if this Walkthrough should be considered or negelected by GMate

DisplayText.description: The user friendly description of what the objective of the Walkthrough. This text is one will be searched by GMate.

CreatedOn.description: The datetime this version of the CommandSheet is created .
